title: Sony SECRETLY changed the PS5 1200 chip!
description: It's been a month long journey to understand the PS5 1200.  The original PS5 1200 video:  Thank you to Creative Electron for the massive help with X-ray!   Closer look at the PS5 X-ray images:  @DigitalFoundry's Direct Weekly:   Angstronomics PS5 1200 Oberon Plus 6nm Breakdown:   Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 This was a mistake 0:46 Creative Electron 3:22 This PS5 is not the same 4:14 Power Testing (again) 6:14 Gaming Power Draw 7:24 Another PS5 enters the chat 8:59 The answer all along 10:50 Inside the PS5 1200
